summary: This document is an email from Lisa O. Hurd to Vahe Stepanian regarding a financial transaction related to a reclaim approved for a residual amount. The email includes details about the transaction and contact information for further inquiries.

persons.name: Lisa O Hurd
persons.context: Lisa O Hurd is the sender of the email, providing information about a financial reclaim.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is the recipient of the email regarding the financial transaction.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is copied on the email regarding the financial reclaim.

keyFacts: The email discusses a financial reclaim approved for a residual amount of $5173.24.
Lisa O Hurd works at Deutsche Bank securities Inc. in private wealth management.
